This app is designed for demonstration purpose. 
Objectives: 
 - learn NavigationUI(menu, Up button, Drawer, Navigation Graph) 
 - learn ViewModel architecture 
 - create ViewModel using ViewModelFactory 
 - implement Observer Pattern 
 - data binding between ViewModel and layout.xml 
 - data binding using binding adapter 
 - implement recycler view (Linear layout) 
 - implement DiffUtil 
 - use Retrofit library to connect to internet 
 - use Glide library to download images 
 - create Room database 
 - create repository and implement CoroutineWorker to prefetch data 
 - data source: https://api.covid19api.com 
 - flag icon source: https://www.countryflags.io
\u0020 - tap navigation drawer to navigate between Rules and About \n - tap menu to select sorting order \n - swipe down to refresh list
